snippet: Some shareholders indicated that they would still seek a change in leadership, despite the resolution of the conflicts between the two chief executives.
abstract: Co-chief executives Jon Goldwater and Nancy Silberkleit of Archie Comic Publications settle their long-standing dispute for control of the family-run company; shareholders indicate that they will seek a change in leadership of the Mamoroneck, NY-based company, despite the resolution.
lead_paragraph: Some shareholders indicated that they would still seek a change in leadership, despite the resolution of the conflicts between the two chief executives.

headline.seo: In Archie Comics Dispute, 2 Leaders Reach Settlement
headline.main: Two in Dispute Over Control of Archie Comic Company Reach Settlement
headline.print_headline: Two in Dispute Over Control of Archie Comic Company Reach a Settlement
